title: dashboard: top-level view of subrepos doesn't match subrepo view
body:
The view of subrepos from the top-level page http://build.golang.org/ doesn't correspond with the first entry for a given subrepo (see e.g., http://build.golang.org/?repo=golang.org%2fx%2ftools ).

Sometimes the top-level page has a green entry, sometimes the subrepo view has a green entry for the same submit, and they don't match.

This makes it difficult to judge the status of the repos.
